noun.definition: The feeling or belief that one can rely on someone or something; firm trust.
noun.example: We have every confidence in their ability to succeed.

noun.definition: A feeling of self-assurance arising from one's appreciation of one's own abilities or qualities.
noun.example: She's a good student, but she lacks confidence.

usage_examples: The team is playing with confidence.
I have confidence that everything will work out.
